DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: Overtime Overview
Overtime for Selected Period
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"Showing Overtime Paid at x1.5 and at x2","WidgetType":"pivotgrid","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"","WidgetHeight":"400","WidgetHeader":{"showContextInfo":false,"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"type":"year","visible":false},"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":false,"Metrics":[{"visible":true,"metricName":"? Forecast","metricFieldValue":"TimeGrandTotal"},{"visible":true,"metricName":"? Actual","metricFieldValue":"UtilizationPercentGrandTotal"}]},"showSubTitle":true,"showTitle":true},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"queryText","value":"SET DATEFIRST 1;

SELECT v.* FROM
(
SELECT Department,
       City,
       [User],
       UserExternalNumber,
       [day],
       [week],
       SUM(Holiday) AS Holiday,
       SUM(Leave) AS Leave,
       SUM(TimesheetUnApproved) AS TimesheetUnApproved,
       SUM(LeaveApproved) AS LeaveApproved,
       SUM(TimesheetWeek) AS WeekHours,
       SUM(TimesheetMoFr) AS TimesheetMoFr,
       SUM(MissingHoursMoFr) AS MissingHoursMoFr,
       SUM(TimesheetMoSa) AS TimesheetMoSa,
       DATEPART(WEEKDAY, DAY) AS [weekday],
       SUM(Timesheet) AS Timesheet,
       CASE
           WHEN DATEPART(WEEKDAY, DAY) IN (1,2,3,4,5) THEN 
				0
           WHEN DATEPART(WEEKDAY, DAY) IN (6)
                AND SUM(TimesheetMoFr) < 40 THEN IIF(SUM(Timesheet) > 8, 8, SUM(Timesheet))
           WHEN DATEPART(WEEKDAY, DAY) IN (7)
                AND SUM(TimesheetMoSa) < 40 THEN IIF(SUM(Timesheet) > 8, 8, SUM(Timesheet))
           ELSE 0
       END AS [Overtime x1],
       CASE
           WHEN DATEPART(WEEKDAY, DAY) IN (1,2,3,4,5) THEN 
				IIF(SUM(Timesheet) > 8, IIF((SUM(Timesheet) - 8) > 4, 4, (SUM(Timesheet) - 8)), 0)
           WHEN DATEPART(WEEKDAY, DAY) IN (6) AND SUM(TimesheetMoFr) < 40 THEN 
				IIF(SUM(Timesheet) <= 8, SUM(Timesheet), IIF(SUM(Timesheet) - 8 > 4, 4, SUM(Timesheet) - 8))
           WHEN DATEPART(WEEKDAY, DAY) IN (6) AND SUM(TimesheetMoSa) > 40 THEN 
				IIF(SUM(Timesheet) < 12, SUM(Timesheet), 12)
           WHEN DATEPART(WEEKDAY, DAY) IN (7) AND SUM(TimesheetMoSa) <= 40 THEN 
				IIF(SUM(Timesheet) <= 8, SUM(Timesheet), IIF(SUM(Timesheet) - 8 > 4, 4, SUM(Timesheet) - 8))
           WHEN DATEPART(WEEKDAY, DAY) IN (7) AND SUM(TimesheetWeek) > 40 THEN 
				IIF(SUM(Timesheet) < 8, SUM(Timesheet), 8)
           ELSE 0
       END AS [Overtime x15],
       CASE
           WHEN DATEPART(WEEKDAY, DAY) IN (1,2,3,4,5) THEN IIF(SUM(Timesheet) > 12, (SUM(Timesheet) - 12), 0)
           WHEN DATEPART(WEEKDAY, DAY) IN (6) AND SUM(TimesheetMoFr) < 40 THEN 
				IIF(SUM(Timesheet) > 12, SUM(Timesheet) - 12, 0)
           WHEN DATEPART(WEEKDAY, DAY) IN (6) AND SUM(TimesheetMoSa) > 40 THEN 
				IIF(SUM(Timesheet) > 12, SUM(Timesheet) - 12, 0)
           WHEN DATEPART(WEEKDAY, DAY) IN (7) AND SUM(TimesheetMoSa) < 40 THEN 
				IIF(SUM(Timesheet) > 12, SUM(Timesheet) - 12, 0)
           WHEN DATEPART(WEEKDAY, DAY) IN (7) AND SUM(TimesheetMoSa) >= 40 THEN 
				IIF(SUM(Timesheet) > 8, SUM(Timesheet) - 8, 0)
           ELSE 0
       END AS [Overtime x2]
FROM
  (SELECT t.Department AS Department,
          c.Name AS City,
          u.Name AS [User],
          u.ExternalNumber AS UserExternalNumber,
          t.[Date] AS [day],
          t.[Date] - DATEPART(dw, t.[Date]) + 1 AS [week],
          SUM(t.ActualTime) AS Timesheet,
          SUM(SUM(IIF(DATEPART(WEEKDAY, t.[Date]) IN (1, 2, 3, 4, 5), t.ActualTime, 0.0))) OVER (PARTITION BY u.[Name],
                                                                                                              t.[Date] - DATEPART(dw, t.[Date]) + 1) AS TimesheetMoFr,
                                                                                                SUM(SUM(IIF(DATEPART(WEEKDAY, t.[Date]) IN (1, 2, 3, 4, 5), IIF((u.RequiredHours - t.ActualTime) > 0.0, (u.RequiredHours - t.ActualTime), 0.0), 0.0))) OVER (PARTITION BY u.[Name],
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          t.[Date] - DATEPART(dw, t.[Date]) + 1) AS MissingHoursMoFr,
			SUM(SUM(IIF(DATEPART(WEEKDAY, t.[Date]) IN (1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6), t.ActualTime, 0.0))) OVER (PARTITION BY u.[Name],
																													t.[Date] - DATEPART(dw, t.[Date]) + 1) AS TimesheetMoSa,
		SUM(IIF(ot.StateMachineTimesheetStatus = 1, 0, t.ActualTime)) AS TimesheetUnApproved,
		0 AS Holiday,
		0 AS Leave,
		SUM(SUM(t.ActualTime)) OVER (PARTITION BY u.ExternalNumber,
												t.[Date] - DATEPART(dw, t.[Date]) + 1) AS TimesheetWeek,
									0 AS LeaveApproved
   FROM 
        Analytics.DatamartTimesheet t,
        Timesheet ot,
		[User] u
        LEFT OUTER JOIN City c ON (u.City = c.Oid)
   WHERE t.Oid = ot.Oid
     AND u.PaidOvertime = 1
     AND t.UserId = u.Oid 
	 /*[DateFilter]*/ AND t.[Date] >= @FromDate AND t.[Date] < @ToDate /*[/DateFilter]*/
   GROUP BY 
		t.Department,
		c.Name,
        u.Name,
        u.ExternalNumber,
        t.[Date],
        t.[Date] - DATEPART(dw, t.[Date]) + 1
   UNION ALL 
   SELECT hld.Department,
                    c.Name AS City,
                    u.Name AS [User],
                    u.ExternalNumber AS UserExternalNumber,
                    hld.[Date] AS DAY,
                    hld.[Date] - DATEPART(dw, hld.[Date]) + 1 AS WEEK,
                    0 AS Timesheet,
                    0 AS TimesheetMoFr,
                    0 AS MissingHoursMoFr,
                    0 AS TimesheetMoSa,
                    0 AS TimesheetUnApproved,
                    u.RequiredHours AS Holiday,
                    0 AS Leave,
                    0 AS TimesheetWeek,
                    0 AS LeaveApproved
   FROM Analytics.DatamartHoliday hld,
		[User] u
        LEFT OUTER JOIN City c ON (u.City = c.Oid)
	WHERE u.PaidOvertime = 1 
	 /*[DateFilter]*/ AND hld.[Date] >= @FromDate AND hld.[Date] < @ToDate /*[/DateFilter]*/
   UNION ALL 
   SELECT lvs.Department AS Department,
                    c.Name AS City,
                    u.Name AS [User],
                    u.ExternalNumber AS UserExternalNumber,
                    lvs.[Date] AS DAY,
                    lvs.[Date] - DATEPART(dw, lvs.[Date]) + 1 AS WEEK,
                    0 AS Timesheet,
                    0 AS TimesheetMoFr,
                    0 AS MissingHoursMoFr,
                    0 AS TimesheetMoSa,
                    0 AS TimesheetUnApproved,
                    0 AS Holiday,
                    lvs.[Hours] AS Leave,
                    0 AS TimesheetWeek,
                    IIF(lvs.Approved = 1, lvs.[Hours], 0) AS LeaveApproved
   FROM Analytics.DatamartLeave lvs,
		[User] u
        LEFT OUTER JOIN City c ON (u.City = c.Oid)
   WHERE u.PaidOvertime = 1
     AND lvs.[UserId] = u.Oid
     AND lvs.Rejected = 0 
	 /*[DateFilter]*/ AND lvs.[Date] >= @FromDate AND lvs.[Date] < @ToDate /*[/DateFilter]*/ ) t
GROUP BY Department,
         City,
         [User],
         UserExternalNumber,
         DAY,
         WEEK
) v
WHERE (v.Timesheet > 0 OR v.Leave > 0)

         ","mapping":""}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"RequiredFilters":["startDate","endDate"]}}]

DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: Exceptions to Selected Period
